title: The Warren Markowitz Show, Politically Incorrect, The End of 2017
description: The Warren Markowitz Show, It's My World You Just Live In It. A soap box for Independent Ideas, current events and politics of the day. Identity Politics, Social Justice, Colusion and Fraud, its been a devil of a year. So what does 2018 hold? Join me as I wander through the matters that seem to matter the most. Trigger Warnings; I'm not intending to be Politically Correct. Podcast: Galtspeaks.com Contact: Radio@galtspeaks.com Follow us on twitter.com/radiomarkowitz & Facebook.com/radiomarkowitz Also available on Podomatic.com at http://wrm.podomatic.com, and Spreaker-www.spreaker.com/show/the-warren-markowitz-show
dc:creator: Warren Markowitz
